desc: Wick & Soy Candle Company makes 100% soy-based candles in Redondo Beach. The candles are all hand-poured in small batches with scents to capture the season. Seasonal scents include Fraser Fir, Gardenia Tuberose, Black Currant & Jasmine, Cashmere Plum, Sandalwood, and candles are Phthalate free

layout.text:
100% Soy Wax Candles
Hand-Poured in Redondo Beach, CA
